page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get up in the morning at 7.30am, go downstairs and eat my breakfast.Then I go upstairs to get dressed. After that I clean my teeth, comb my hair and have a wash.Then at 8.35am I go to school.I walk to school and when I get there I play French Skipping in the playground. At 8.55am we go inside to work. Work means Maths,English, Spelling,Topic work,Creative writing and Handwriting. At 10.30am to 10.45am we have break and again at 12.00 noon to 1.30pm. The teacher reads to us at 3.00pm and at 3.30pm we go home.I play with Jayne and at about 7.00pm I go home for my tea. I stay inside and read or watch TV until 9.00pm when I go to bed.
